Title: Corrects a reference to the applicable tax assessment roll for a tax exemption granted to the Ruth AME Zion Church
Summary: Corrects a reference to the applicable tax assessment roll for a tax exemption granted to the Ruth AME Zion Church in the town of Brookhaven, county of Suffolk.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 381 of the laws of 2023 relating to authorizing the Ruth AME Zion Church to file with the town of Brookhaven assessor an application for certain real property tax exemptions, in relation to correcting the reference to the applicable tax assessment roll
